languages.text: "Мыслю, он желал запустить сего бурового машинного зверя. Уралон ищет что-то внизу, в глубинных чертогах мануфакторума. Мои воины взорвали энергетический кладезь и заглушили бур, но мерзкий малефик нашел способ привести его в действие своей нечестивой магией".

"He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."
languages.original_text: "Мыслю, он желал запустить сего бурового машинного зверя. Уралон ищет что-то внизу, в глубинных чертогах мануфакторума. Мои воины взорвали энергетический кладезь и заглушили бур, но мерзкий малефик нашел способ привести его в действие своей нечестивой магией".

My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “他打算唤醒隧道里的巨兽。如果你想知道我是怎么想的，我认为，乌拉隆正在制造工厂最深处的大厅里寻找什么东西。我的战士们已经摧毁了能量源，让那台钻机安静了下来，但那个该死的异端分子还是找到了办法，用他那邪恶的魔法再次启动了钻机。”
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."

traits.locale_text: “他打算唤醒隧道里的巨兽。如果你想知道我是怎么想的，我认为，乌拉隆正在制造工厂最深处的大厅里寻找什么东西。我的战士们已经摧毁了能量源，让那台钻机安静了下来，但那个该死的异端分子还是找到了办法，用他那邪恶的魔法再次启动了钻机。”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Il tentait de réveiller le mastodonte des tunnels. Si vous voulez connaître le fond de ma pensée, Uralon cherche quelque chose dans les tréfonds du manufactorum. Mes guerriers ont détruit la source d'énergie et fait taire la foreuse, mais l'infâme scélérat a tout de même trouvé un moyen de le ramener à la vie avec son abominable magie. »
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."

traits.locale_text: « Il tentait de réveiller le mastodonte des tunnels. Si vous voulez connaître le fond de ma pensée, Uralon cherche quelque chose dans les tréfonds du manufactorum. Mes guerriers ont détruit la source d'énergie et fait taire la foreuse, mais l'infâme scélérat a tout de même trouvé un moyen de le ramener à la vie avec son abominable magie. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「彼は地下に巣食う巨獣を起こそうとした。俺が思うに、ウラロンは聖工場の最深部の地下で何かを探している。俺の戦士たちがエネルギーの源泉を破壊してドリルを停止させたが、あのクズは凶悪な魔法で復活させる方法を見つけたようだ」
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は地下に巣食う巨獣を起こそうとした。俺が思うに、ウラロンは聖工場の最深部の地下で何かを探している。俺の戦士たちがエネルギーの源泉を破壊してドリルを停止させたが、あのクズは凶悪な魔法で復活させる方法を見つけたようだ」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «Quería despertar esta enorme tuneladora. Si me lo pregunta, Uralon está buscando algo en las profundidades, en los salones más recónditos del manufactorum. Mis guerreros han destruido la fuente de energía y silenciado el taladro, pero el deleznable villano ha encontrado la forma de usar sus artes oscuras para revivirlo».
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."

traits.locale_text: «Quería despertar esta enorme tuneladora. Si me lo pregunta, Uralon está buscando algo en las profundidades, en los salones más recónditos del manufactorum. Mis guerreros han destruido la fuente de energía y silenciado el taladro, pero el deleznable villano ha encontrado la forma de usar sus artes oscuras para revivirlo».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Er wollte den Tunnelkoloss aufwecken. Wenn Ihr nach meinen Gedanken hungert, Uralon sucht unten etwas, in den tiefsten Hallen des Manufactorums. Meine Krieger haben den Energiequell zerstört und den Bohrer zum Schweigen gebracht, doch der widerwärtige Schurke hat dennoch einen Weg gefunden, ihn durch seine schändliche Hexerei wiederzubeleben."
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."

traits.locale_text: "Er wollte den Tunnelkoloss aufwecken. Wenn Ihr nach meinen Gedanken hungert, Uralon sucht unten etwas, in den tiefsten Hallen des Manufactorums. Meine Krieger haben den Energiequell zerstört und den Bohrer zum Schweigen gebracht, doch der widerwärtige Schurke hat dennoch einen Weg gefunden, ihn durch seine schändliche Hexerei wiederzubeleben."
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Tünel kazan zebellayı uyandırmak istiyordu. Fikrimi merak ediyorsan söyleyeyim: Uralon aşağıda, manufaktorumun en derindeki salonlarında bulunan bir şeyin peşinde. Savaşçılarım, enerji kaynağını yok edip matkabı susturdu. Ancak mide kaldıran habislik, iğrenç büyülerini kullanarak bunu hayata döndürmenin bir yolunu buldu."
languages.original_text: "He wished to wake the tunnelling behemoth. If you hunger for my thoughts, Uralon is searching for something down below, in the manufactorum's deepest halls. My warriors destroyed the energy fount and silenced the drill, but the detestable malefic still found a way to revive it with his heinous magics."
